case.state: Grrr... I didn't think that I'd be playin' with the champion whore tonight.
Tch... What's that whore of a champion doin' here?
Wanna see what destruction looks like? Here it is in human form—it's your boy Guzma!
It’s showtime!
You already know who it is- it’s your boy Guzma!
This seems like the kind of place where I could find some new recruits for the team.
Is that...a clown?
And people call us freaks.
Who's this joker?
The hell is that thing? I ain't ever seen that thing on a pokedex.
That some kind of talkin' fairy type?
Wait, we bringing out Pokémon after all? Are we gonna battle, or is that thing gonna play cards now?
That some weird lookin' Mareep? Are we gonna be havin' a Pokémon battle after all?
Grrr... I didn't think that I'd be playin' with the champion whore tonight.
Tch... What's that whore of a champion doin' here?
Hot damn, you got a set of legs on you, girl.
Damn, ya got legs for days, babe. I think I'm gonna really enjoy this 'ere game.
(Damn, that lady seems like she might actually be fun.)
Glad to see someone a bit more mature'll be playin'. i like 'em experienced.
(Man, this pink chick is nothin' but smiles and sunshine, isn't she?)
Don't they freakin' check ID or somethin' at the entrance?
Hey girly, I think you've got the wrong place. The kiddie pool's two blocks down.
(hm... That pink-haired kid seems like she's got some spunk to her. Maybe I oughta see if she's up to snuff.)
Tch. I hate rich prats like you. At least I'll get to beat ya in the dirt.
...Somethin' ain't right about that guy in the hat.
Shouldn't they take away your freakin' guns before they let you in?
The hell? Who the hell lets someone with a buncha guns into a freakin' bar?
(Damn, that dude looks tough as hell. Team Skull always needs new muscle...)
I saw the story about that Verity girl. Abandonin' your own child. People like you are the worst.

Yo, why are we in a bedroom? You got something weird in mind, punk?
Whose room is this? This ain't some creepy thing, is it, punk?
Playing in the bedroom, huh? You got something in mind, girly?
Bedroom, huh? Guess that makes sense for a private game.
Damnit. What's that freak whore doin' here? Maybe if I just ignore her, she'll go away.
Am I really going to have to deal with that slut's nonsense the whole game? Maybe I'll just ignore her.
Yo, big guy, what'd you say your name was? Jotaro? i think I'll just call ya 'JoJo' for short!
Alone on V-Day, huh? Heh. Figures.
If you want a pummelin' I can give ya one, but the hell are y'all doing in this damn forest?
The heck are ya'll doing here? I was tryin' to catch this dark type and stumbled into you punks.
Heh! Looks like we got a whole crowd gatherin' here to watch y'all get beaten down by Guzma!
Enjoy the show, folks. Just don't be mad when ya boy inevitably wins this!
Really? Y'all chumps couldn't even get in? Tch, whatever, let's just play!
Hah! You punks couldn't even make it past the door!
Hey, this place reminds me of back home! Always nice to punk some chumps in a familiar setting.
This place feels like Alola... but it ain't. Weird.
Whose pad is this?
The owner of this place must be loaded!
Huh. This place kinda reminds me of the A- NEVERMIND!
This place just ain't my style, y'know. Too... bleh.
The hell is this? Some sappy wallpaper?
...Not sure how I feel about this.
Some of y’all look familiar… Eh, I’ll still punk you all the same.
Literature club? What the hell are all these literature nerds doing here?
Y'all a part of some freakin' poetry club? The hell are you doing at a place like this?
But only if they impress me! Let's see if anyone here is worth it.
Oh? Ya'll seem to want a challenge. Well, if it’s a fight you want, it’s a fight you’re gonna get!
I ain’t scared of people like ya'll! Bring it on!
I've already won this game! You punks can't even touch me!
Dealio! Toss me ~cards~ cards!
~cards~'s all I need to smash ya!
Gimme... ~cards~.
~cards~ cards! Make it quick!
Uh... ~cards~ cards, I guess.
~cards~ should be enough.
You shitlords are goin' down!
Get ready for a beatdown, people!
Ain't nobody getting the better of me this round!
Prepare to be destroyed!
Hah! I got this round in the bag, punks!
You're gettin' crushed, punks. Ain't no doubt about it.
Nice.
Say goodbye to your clothes, y'all, ya boy has this round on lock!
Heh, no chance in hell I'm losin' this round!
Oh, hell yeah! This hand's gonna crush you all!
This game's all comin' up Guzma!
Scared yet, people? You oughta be with ya boy Guzma around!
Ain't nobody getting the better of me this round!
Ya boy's got this in the bag!
Hope you're ready to go down, losers.
I'll show you who's boss of this game.
Who I'm up against and what my odds are doesn't matter - I'm gonna beat you down!
Get ready to be smashed by the naked, but still hated boss of Team Skull!
You fools thought you had me cornered, huh? Not a chance!
Game of skill, game of luck - whatever, I refuse to lose either way!
Hell yeah!
Ya boy's got the good stuff, both with his bod and with his hand!
Y'all chumps are in for it now!
You're not gettin' me uncovered this time!
It's a wrap for y'all!
Y'all are in for it now!
Prepare to be smashed into bits!
They don't call me 'the Undefeated' for nothin'! Y'all don't stand a chance!
It's time you all get utterly destroyed.
Oh, yeah, Guzma's got this round on lockdown!
You chumps had no idea who you were messin' with, challengin' me!
I don't even need hands like these to beat fools like you all!
If you thought you could ever beat me, you're even more stupid than I thought!
Right, now I'm gettin' a good hand! What a load of crap!
Y'all are gonna pay for makin' me ditch the bling!
It's showtime, punks. Prepare to get wrecked.
I've been goin' easy on you losers so far. Ain't gonna happen again.
Maybe the pants were weighin' me down or something! You ain't got me beat now!
Watch as big bad Guzma beats you into the ground!
I'd have liked hands like these earlier, you punks!
Tch. Like I was ever even worried.
Y'all are gonna see what happens when you mess with big, bad Guzma!
I'd have liked to face off in a Pokémon Battle or somethin' - this whole poker thing is whack.
You guys must be pretty dumb to think you have a chance against ya boy!
People like to call me the ‘human version of rat poison.’ I just thank ‘em for the compliment.
You're gonna need a damn good hand to take me down, now.
Tch! This hand's all I need. Ya punks are going down!
These ought to be enough to beat all of ya punks.
Do y'all do this stuff for fun or something? That's weird as heck.
You chumps never even stood a chance.
Ya better get ready to strip, dorks.
Guzma's got this round covered, losers.
These ought to be enough to beat all of ya punks.
Quit stallin' and show me your hands, people!
Gotta say, I hate this whole borin' 'waiting around' bit.
Pokémon battles are helluva lot quicker than this.
Huh?! This ain't the hand I needed, dealer!
I've never been scared of nothin' or nobody! So show me your damn hand already!
What, you tryin' to make this suspenseful or something? Flip your freakin' cards!
I meant it when I said all or nothin'. And this right here? This is it, punks!
This ain't my style, dealer. I hope you get that.
I ain't gonna have trouble beating y'all with these!
Ain't no way I'm losing this!
Hands like these are all I need against losers like you all.
I don't mind a challenge. Don't think any of you were ever up to snuff, though.
Eh. Can't be any worse than what you chumps probably have.
The bling's gonna be staying on this round, chumps!
What's your angle, anyway? You guys just do this to see people naked? That's whack.
Hah! This hand couldn't be better!
This here hand? Yea, it's gonna crush you.
I'm surprised the rest of ya haven't given up yet, considering you're up against big, bad Guzma!
I hate waiting on y'all to do your turns, so hurry up!
Just do your damn turns! I hate standin' 'round here without the bling.
What's takin' so damn long, chump? Just flip your cards!
I ain't got no time to mess around with hands like these!
That's it, y'all are goin' down!
You better start playin' along if ya don't want to be smashed up, dealer!
The hell is with this hand? Could it get any more freakin' lame?
Tch! I can pull through with this hand! I'm big, bad Guzma!
This hand is all I need to smash you all!
Just 'cause you got me on my last layer doesn't mean nothing - I got this game on lock!
If you think you got what it takes, then show me your hand.
Damn it! ~Cheater~, I know you're behind this shit and just so you know, I ain't one to forgive 'n' forget.
This how ya get your kicks, ~cheater~? 'Cause I can kick you plenty if you need me to, bastard!
Tch! This ain't gonna be enough to stop Guzma!
You want me to smash you, dealer?!
Tch! This hand is a bad joke.
The hell is this hand, dealer?
Card games are for chumps, anyway!
You want me to smash you, dealer?!
I'm really startin' to get tired of this game.
Yeah, this hand blows chunks. Tch, whatever.
Tch! This ain't gonna be enough to stop Guzma!
You want me to smash you, dealer?!
Like I ain't used to life dealin' me a shit hand.
Guzma! What is wrong with you?!
If ya make me lose the bling, dealer, I'll be making you lose a lot more!
Yo, these cards are good enough, right? You better not be messin' with me, dealer.
I said I'm not losing the bling. I don't think you freakin' heard me.
Y'all are stupid!
Tch! This game's dumb, anyway - how about we have a proper Pokémon battle or somethin'?
One of y'all has been rigging this damn thing from the start. Ain't gonna be pretty when I find out who.
This ain't gonna work.
(C’mon, Guzma! You can do better than this!) …Tch.
Guzma!! You can't go and lose now!
Damn it! Y'all have been settin' me up or somethin'!
...What a load of shit.
Tch! A hand like this is like asking for a beating!
Whatever, ya dumb punks. I don't need a great hand to beat y'all down!
Who the hell's shufflin' these damn cards?
This is the part where you run.
Guzma!! What is wrong with you? If ya keep getting hands like this, you're toast!
Who do I gotta crush for gettin' a hand as crap as this, huh?
Looks like someone is askin' for a pummeling here!
This hand's shit, plain an' simple. But I bet one of you chumps is even worse.
Guzma!! If I'm gettin' hands like these, I'm gonna need to go nude!
Y'all are stupid!
The hell kind of hand is this, dealer?
This is a joke, right?
...Motherfucker.
...I'm not even gonna acknowledge a hand this shitty.
This hand can kiss my ass.
I'm proud of Team Skull because we're a gang of survivors. We're the people who refused to stop just because people told us we couldn't do it.
...Aaaare you alright there?
...Aah?
Heh. I don't know what the most humiliatin' moment of your lives is, but when this game is over, y'all are gonna have a new one.
I hope y'all are ready to experience the most humiliatin' moment of your lives.
What? Are ya here to find some other chump to sleep around with?
Let me guess, you're probably here to find some more chumps to sleep around with.
Yea, I bet she has a freakin' name. And i also bet she can tell me off without having some white knight butt in!
Yeah, she has a name. And she can tell me that herself without you going off on me.
Hey, yo, pink chick. What's up with your friend over there? She's givin' me the creeps.
What's with all the damn kids around here? I see enough of you brats acting tough on Alola.
The hell kinda game is this? Do you kids even know what y'all are gettin' into?
You're on, dork! If you wanna totally embarrass yourself, go ahead!
Why are we even givin' the freakin' computer cards? The hell's it supposed to strip?
Y'know what, kid? Maybe I was wrong - tiny or not, you got fight in ya.
Iunno how you pulled that off with the belts, JoJo, but if you're that quick, I think I have an offer for ya.
Is Star Platinum, like... some Pokémon? I don't really have any other guesses 'ere.
Uh, I mean, that ain't that big of a deal. 20 grand is nothin'.
What, am I too loud for your delicate little ears, punk? Buzz off!
Ain't no rules about bein' loud, punk, so either square up or shut up.
Hold up, that sheep thing talks?
How do people in documentaries know what's goin' on in the sun? Ain't nobody ever been.
You talking about pubes, witch girl? Yea, chicks shave. It looks good.
Tch! I don't mind it or nothing. Don't make a huge difference for me, or whatever.
Yeah, I guess ya got that right, lady.
World's full'a liars and posers, lady. If ya don't do it yourself, ya get screwed over.
I'm damn good at everythin' I do, lady. That much I can guarantee ya.
Y'know, a crib? Like... a pad. The digs. That kinda crib.
Runnin' a team like Team Skull's a handful, but I wouldn't change it for nothin'.
Tch. Ain't like it'd be a freakin' secret if I told ya, lady.
Kanto? You mean that region where that weirdo professor came from?
Kanto? Izzat where you're from? The finally get a Dark-type Gym Leader?
Who the hell izzat? You got grunts too, girly?
Whozzat? I'll beat 'em to a pulp too!
Killed someone? The hell are you on about?
What's playing a damn card game gotta do with killin' fools? I'm just here to win, girly.
Guess I'm into hip-hop, and techno stuff. Ain't like I got much time for music when I got chumps like you to beat.
Yo, kid! Why even play this game if you're gonna be this awkward? And what's all the nerd stuff you keep going on about?
A million bucks? I guess I'd deck out a sweet crib for Team Skull or somethin'.
Tch! I ain't got no problem with lyin', lady. Don't care if they hurt anyone.
Not like my real family ever did nothin' for me. If we talking Team Skull, ain't nothin' more important.
